scripts.build:dist:main: browserify src/react-intl.js -s ReactIntl -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g [envify --NODE_ENV development] -t babelify -t browserify-shim -d | exorcist -b ./ dist/react-intl.js.map > dist/react-intl.js
scripts.build:dist:main:min: browserify src/react-intl.js -s ReactIntl -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g [envify --NODE_ENV production] -t babelify -t browserify-shim | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/react-intl.min.js
scripts.build:dist:with-data: browserify src/react-intl-with-locales.js -s ReactIntl -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g [envify --NODE_ENV development] -t babelify -t browserify-shim -d | exorcist -b ./ dist/react-intl-with-locales.js.map > dist/react-intl-with-locales.js
scripts.build:dist:with-data:min: browserify src/react-intl-with-locales.js -s ReactIntl -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g [envify --NODE_ENV production] -t babelify -t browserify-shim | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/react-intl-with-locales.min.js
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:dist:main && npm run build:dist:main:min && npm run build:dist:with-data && npm run build:dist:with-data:min
scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run build
